item.title: About Me
item.description:

I am Avi.

Education

I have completed my Bachelors in Statistics from the well knowned historical institute the Indian Statistical Institute from its main brach Kolkata. I have also completed my Master’s degree from there

Interests

I am interested in Probability, Number theory, Statistics, Cricket, Football, Cooking, Book Reading etc.

This is my personal website built using Hugo.
